Welcome, Blockhead

Blockheads is a community for gamers to discover great blockchain games, and earn rewards for playing them. We keep our finger on the pulse of web3 gaming by analyzing the leading blockchains to bring you the top games and the movers and the shakers.

Join Alpha

Blockheads Rewards

Blockheads Rewards Alpha

Connect your wallet. Play games. Get Rewarded.

Our first project for Blockheads is called Rewards. Players earn crypto rewards for completing quests within top web3 games. Fill out the form below to join our Alpha.

Who we are

Blockheads is a project by Thirdwave, a US-based gaming tech company trying to help bring blockchain gaming to the mainstream. We are a team of gamers, designers, and blockchain enthusiasts (not crypto bros!) who think blockchain will change the gaming industry. Our team has worked on gaming initiatives at Meta, Coinbase and other leading tech firms.
